actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 111-92.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Waco Mammoth National Monument in the State of Texas.
short_title: Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2009

summary.text:
Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2009 - Establishes in Texas, as a unit of the National Park System, the Waco Mammoth National Monument.

Authorizes the construction of essential administrative or visitor use facilities on non-federal land within the boundary of the Monument.

Requires the Secretary of the Interior, in consultation with Baylor University and the city of Waco, to complete a general management plan for the Monument.

titles.title: Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2009
